title: Meet Sachin Katti, IIT Bombay grad who quit Intel after 6 months as AI chief to join OpenAI
description: IIT Bombay Alumni Sachin Katti has departed from his role as Intel's artificial intelligence chief to join OpenAI. His exit comes just six months after he took the top AI post at the chip giant.
content: Sachin Katti has resigned as Intel’s Chief Technology and AI Officer just six months after stepping into the role. Katti is now joining OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, where he will be responsible for designing and scaling the compute infrastruct... [3910 chars]

title: Intel Loses AI Leader Sachin Katti to OpenAI as CEO Tan Lip-Bu Takes Charge of AI Operations
description: Intel’s AI chief Sachin Katti is leaving to join OpenAI, where he’ll lead infrastructure for artificial general intelligence. Intel CEO Tan Lip-Bu will now oversee AI strategy following major executive reshuffles aimed at streamlining operations and boosting competitiveness.
content: Intel’s Chief Technology and AI Officer, Sachin Katti, is leaving the company to join OpenAI. He shared the news on the social media platform X, expressing gratitude for his four-year journey at Intel, where he led efforts in networking, edge computi... [1966 chars]

title: AI's Next Smart Move Might Be Scrapping the Chatbot
description: For three years, chatbots have been the face of generative artificial intelligence. Type anything in them to get a personalized response, which morphs into a seemingly magical dialogue with a machine. While that conversational interface may seem the best way to harness large language models, some companies are starting to ditch chatbots, worried about liability and loss of control.
content: For three years, chatbots have been the face of generative artificial intelligence. Type anything in them to get a personalized response, which morphs into a seemingly magical dialogue with a machine. While that conversational interface may seem the ... [517 chars]

title: AI agents open door to new hacking threats
description: AI agents are programs that use artificial intelligence chatbots to do the work humans do online, like buy a plane ticket or add events to a calendar.
content:
NEW YORK: Cybersecurity experts are warning that artificial intelligence agents, widely considered the next frontier in the generative AI revolution, could wind up getting hijacked and doing the dirty work for hackers.

title: Intel's AI chief Sachin Katti jumps ship to OpenAI, will help build human-like intelligence for ChatGPT
description: Intel’s top artificial intelligence executive, Sachin Katti, has left the chipmaker to join OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT. Katti will play a key role in developing the infrastructure that supports OpenAI’s efforts to create AI systems capable of thinking and learning more like humans.

content:

title: AI scams fuel rise in fake online car sales. How California is trying to protect consumers.
description: Buying a car is one of the biggest purchases we make, and more people are turning to online marketplaces for deals on used cars. But thanks to artificial intelligence, you're more likely than ever to get scammed.
